畱字的基本解释

畱
liú
古同“留”。

畱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liú］
同“留1”。同“留3”。

畱字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【田字部】　畱； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页764第01
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?力求切，音流。【說文】畱，止也。【史記·秦本紀】臣知虞君不用臣，臣誠私利祿爵且畱。又【越世家】莊生曰：可疾去矣，愼毋畱。　又遲也。【易·旅卦】君子以明愼用?，而不畱獄。【史記·匈奴傳】然而諸宿將常坐畱落不遇。【註】謂遲畱零落，不遇合也。　又久也。【禮·儒行】悉數之，乃畱更僕，未可終也。【註】畱，久也。　又徐也。【吳語】一日惕，一日畱。【註】惕，疾也。畱，徐也。　又已去而止之也。【正字通】李元紘治潤有惠政，及代去，吏民遮畱。　又【楚語】舉國畱之。【註】畱，治也。　又伺便也。【莊子·刻意篇】執彈而畱之。　又【戰國策】使秦而欲屠趙，不顧一子以畱計。【註】畱，不决也。　又【左思·魏都賦】朝無刓印，國無費畱。【註】凶命曰費畱。　又姓。【詩·王風】丘中有麻，彼畱子嗟。【傳】畱，大夫氏。子嗟，字也。【韻會】出會稽，本衞大夫，畱封人之後，吳志有左將畱贊。　又地名。【左傳·襄元年】楚子辛救鄭，侵宋呂畱。【註】呂畱二縣，今屬彭城郡。

[Won Collection 1] [Tian Zi Department] 　 Liu; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 764 01
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Strive for cutting, sound flow. [Said the text] Stay and stop. [Historical Records·Qin Benji] The ministers knew that Yu Jun didn't need the ministers, and the ministers were sincere and private and stayed. [Yue Shijia] Zhuang Sheng said: You can go away quickly, but don't stay.　It's too late. [Easy·Travel Gua] The gentleman uses the wisely and does not stay in jail. [Historical Records: The Biography of the Xiongnu] However, the generals often sit and stay. [Note] It is said that the late stay is scattered, and it is not met.　It's been a long time. 【Rite·Confucianism】All of them are reserved for more servants, and they may not be finalized. [Note] Stay for a long time.　 Xu Ye again. [Wuyu] Be alert for one day and stay for one day. [Note] Vigilance, disease also. Stay, Xu Ye.　It's gone and stopped. 【Zhengzitong】Li Yuanhong governed with beneficial governance, and went on behalf of the government, and the officials and the people stayed.　[Chu language] The whole country stayed. [Note] Stay and cure.　It's also serving again. [Zhuangzi: Deliberate Articles] Keep the bullets.　[Warring States Policy] made Qin want to slaughter Zhao, ignoring one son in order to save. [Note] To stay, not to decide.　[Zuo Si·Wei Du Fu] There is no dying in the North, and there is no fee to stay in the country. [Note] Fierce fate is called Fei Liu.　Another last name. [Poetry·Wang Feng] There is hemp in the mound, Bi Liu Ziwei. [Biography] Stay, doctor. Zibo, the word is also. [Rhyme Club] After going out of Kuaiji, the doctor of the health department, after leaving the seal, Wu Zhiyou left general.　Also place name. [Zuo Zhuan·First Year of Xiang] Chu Zixin rescued Zheng and invaded Song Luliu. [Note] Luliu two counties are now Pengcheng County.
